attributes.action: To wish the King and a very Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year.
attributes.additional_details: By a motion in the Commons to make clear that Charles enjoys their full support in advance of his coronation.
attributes.background: To give courage to our King and the nation before his coronation following the sad death of his mother, our late Queen and the estrangement of his son, the Duke of Sussex.

rejection.details:
The House of Commons agreed a motion on Saturday 10th September paying tribute to Her late Majesty The Queen and pledging loyalty and support to His Majesty The King. 

You can read more here:

https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2022-09-10/debates/B527DCC8-B663-4467-B447-6BD9881A2C6C/BusinessWithoutDebate
